endpoints.description: Fetch a list of all real estate transaction-related documents managed by the service.
Retrieve the details and content of a specific document by its ID.
Upload a new document relevant to a real estate transaction.
Update the metadata or content of an existing document by its ID.
Remove a document associated with a real estate transaction from the system.
Retrieve a list of real estate transactions currently processed.
Initiate a new real estate transaction in the service.
Execute validation procedures for the documents and information of a given transaction.
Mark a transaction as finalized and archive associated documents properly.
Check the current status and compliance results of a specified transaction.
